title: 3 Easy Ways to Sketch a Frog

steps.title: Sample cartoon frog.
steps.content: Sample cartoon frog.

steps.title: Draw two horizontally-elongated ovals, which overlap each other.
steps.content: Draw two horizontally-elongated ovals, which overlap each other. The top oval is smaller compared to the other.

steps.title: Add two rings on the left and right sides of the upper oval.
steps.content: Add two rings on the left and right sides of the upper oval. This will be for the frog’s big eyes.

steps.title: Draw the details of the frog’s face using curves.
steps.content: Draw the details of the frog’s face using curves.

steps.title: Draw the details for the frog’s limbs using curves.
steps.content: Draw the details for the frog’s limbs using curves. Draw the webbed feet.

steps.title: Refine the body using curves.
steps.content: Refine the body using curves.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Color to your liking!
steps.content: Color to your liking!

steps.title: Sample general frog.
steps.content: Sample general frog.

steps.title: Start by drawing an elongated shape and then make its left side pointy.
steps.content: Start by drawing an elongated shape and then make its left side pointy. Then, add two small circles on the uppermost right part of the shape.

steps.title: Draw its hind legs and front legs next.
steps.content: Draw its hind legs and front legs next. Sketch a bumpy line for its nostrils and mouth.

steps.title: Add in details such as his eyes, his dimpled grin and his stomach.
steps.content: Add in details such as his eyes, his dimpled grin and his stomach.

steps.title: Add a final touch; small circles to illustrate the freckled skin of the frog.
steps.content: Add a final touch; small circles to illustrate the freckled skin of the frog.

steps.title: Outline your drawing with a black pen or marker and then clean up the penciled sketch with an eraser.
steps.content: Outline your drawing with a black pen or marker and then clean up the penciled sketch with an eraser.

steps.title: Color it in and you’re done.
steps.content: Color it in and you’re done. Use colors such as dark green, yellow-green, and cream or white.

steps.title: Sample traditional frog.
steps.content: Sample traditional frog.

steps.title: Draw an elongated oval that's tilted in the upper right direction.
steps.content: Draw an elongated oval that's tilted in the upper right direction. Draw a circle which overlaps the upper part of the oval.

steps.title: Draw the hind legs, using straight lines to provide the framework.
steps.content: Draw the hind legs, using straight lines to provide the framework. Draw this connected to the rear part of the frog.

steps.title: Draw the front limbs.
steps.content: Draw the front limbs. Use straight lines connected to the middle part of the oval.

steps.title: Refine the head by using curved lines.
steps.content: Refine the head by using curved lines. Add details for the eyes, mouth, and nose.

steps.title: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Refine and color the drawing as you like!
steps.content: Refine and color the drawing as you like!
